home.title: Hello!, my name is
home.name: Daniel Cabral.
home.description: I'm a Passionate Frontend Developer with a keen eye for detail and a creative approach to solving complex problems. Proficient in translating design concepts into responsive and user-friendly interfaces. A dedicated professional committed to staying abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends. Excited to contribute technical expertise and innovation to dynamic projects.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my projects that i've been working on

project_1.title: GameNest (En desarrollo)
project_1.description: I am currently working on a service that will offer a way to find games, save them in a collection, keeping track of them, read/create reviews of the games you've played, and more. You can find the updates in the repository.

project_2.title: DonC Alojamientos
project_2.description: I designed a website where you can book different types of houses, view their information, or even publish your own.

project_3.title: Dog360
project_3.description: I worked on a website where you will find information about dogs, such as breed, size, weight, etc.

project_4.title: Dawson E-commerce
project_4.description: I designed an e-commerce website where you can purchase products from different categories. In this project, I worked alongside colleagues using agile methodologies.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: If you want to contact me, you can do it through my email or my social networks.
